meanings.definition: Of or relating to a cylinder.
meanings.sent1: The cylindric shape of the container made it easy to roll.
meanings.sent2: The cylindric tower stood tall against the sky.
meanings.sent3: The cylindric vase wobbled comically on the uneven table.
meanings.sent4: Her hair, styled in a cylindric bun, resembled a perfect coil.
meanings.sent5: The cylindric pillar supported the weight of the entire structure.

meanings.definition: Having the form of a cylinder.
meanings.sent1: The cylindric tube fit snugly into the opening.
meanings.sent2: The cylindric body of the pen rolled off the desk.
meanings.sent3: The cylindric cake looked like a delicious log.
meanings.sent4: His voice echoed through the cylindric tunnel.
meanings.sent5: The cylindric handle was easy to grip.
